Implication: "A music concerto is happening on stage, with the lights on spot, while the audience listens in the dark."
Referring expressions: The people, play  A music concerto, stage, lights, audience, dark
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsAt(a,b)))) -> (exists f (exists e (exists c ((IsOnStage(c) and IsSpotlit(e)) and (IsInDark(f) or IsAudience(f))))))
